title: Ep 87: C'est Génial! with Sylvie Chantecaille
itunes:title: Ep 87: C'est Génial! with Sylvie Chantecaille
itunes:subtitle: Sylvie Chantecaille, who launched Prescriptives and then founded her own beauty brand, Chantecaille, talks about her debutante days, French beauty secrets, and why environmental causes are so close to her heart. We also chat about the 2018 Pantone colo...
description:
Sylvie Chantecaille, who launched Prescriptives and then founded her own beauty brand, Chantecaille, talks about her debutante days, French beauty secrets, and why environmental causes are so close to her heart. We also chat about the 2018 Pantone color of the year, the K-beauty trend "glass skin," and ways to give back this holiday season. 

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
